definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: born, only cstr. [[וְלִיד]] Ge 17:12 + 4 t.; pl. [[יְלִידֵי]] Ge 14:14 + 6 t.; [[בִּילִדֵי]] 2Sa 21:18; —born, esp. of slave [[וְלִיד בַּיִת]] born in (one's) house (opp. purchased by money) Ge 17:12, Ge 17:13, Ge 17:27, Le 22:11 (all P), cf. Je 2:14 where denied of Israel; [[יְלִידֵי]] [[בַיִת]] id. Ge 14:14; pl. elsewh. subst. = children, sons [[הרפה]] ´[[יל]] 2Sa 21:16, 2Sa 21:18 cf. [[הָרְפָאִים]] ´[[יל]] 1Ch 20:4; [[הענק]] ´[[יל]] Nu 13:22, Nu 13:28, Jos 15:14 (all JE).
